ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The European Commission, under the 7th Framework Programme, supported this study through funding the collaborative research project LAGOONS (Contract No 283157). The authors would like to thank the LAGOONS partners from the University of Dundee for developing the qualitative socio-economic scenarios and the LAGOONS partners from the four study areas for organizing and running the stakeholder workshops and for proving data for model setup and calibration. Stein Turtum√∏ygard from the Norwegian Institute for Agricultural and Environmental Research is also gratefully acknowledged for his support in creating the scenario land use maps.
